EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Dealer Update #4.2020 Dealer Update #4
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - April 27, 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | April 2020 New Sales and Operator Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2020-48 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-48 Rev - BGA Surplus Equipment Offerings.pdf]]> BGA Surplus Equipment Offerings - OIB-2020-05 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/oib-2020-05-rev-fans-1a-pm-cpdlc-upgrade-for-business-aircraft-mk-ii-plusv2.pdf]]> FANS 1/A+ and PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft - OIB-2020-44 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/oib-2020-44-jetwave-promotions.pdf]]> JetWave Promotions
Dealers can find 2020 sales bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
